Third Party Add-ons Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

This dialog box appears after you launch LabVIEW if you have third-party LabVIEW add-ons installed that you have not yet activated.

Use this dialog box to launch the Third Party Add-on Activation Wizard, which you can use to activate third-party LabVIEW add-ons.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Add-on Name—Lists the third-party add-ons installed on the computer.
  • Activation Status—Displays the activation status for each add-on. The status can be Activated, Evaluation, Expired, or Invalid.
  • Days Remaining—Displays the number of days remaining before the activation expires. LabVIEW displays this number only for add-ons with licenses that can expire, such as Evaluation licenses.
  • Continue to LabVIEW—Closes this dialog box and launches LabVIEW.
  • Activate Add-ons—Displays the Third Party Add-on Activation Wizard, which you can use to activate the third-party add-ons shown in this dialog box.
